German court to rule on 'extremist' label for AfDA German court is due to rule this week on whether security services can treat the far-right Alternative for Germany and its youth wing as suspected extremist organisations, a decision that could cost the party dearly in upcoming European elections. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 23:03:28 GMT JBOMMHJNWZO7XPAY34G2ZWWOPM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/german-court-rule-extremist-label-afd-2024-03-11/Thomas Escritt世界欧洲
Ukraine's Zelenskiy says frontline situation better than in prior three monthsPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Monday that the situation along the front of Ukraine's war with Russia was the best it had been in three months, with Moscow's troops no longer advancing after their capture last month of the eastern city of Avdiivka. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 22:36:39 GMT J6Y5IGPVZZKBHAMVGCWAQHNC3U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-says-frontline-situation-better-than-prior-third-months-2024-03-11/Reuters世界欧洲
North Korean delegation meets Mongolian President in rare visit -KCNANorth Korea's Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Myong Ho met with Mongolian President Ukhnaagiin Khurelsukh on Monday, North Korean state media KCNA said, in a rare foreign trip by a diplomatic delegation from the isolated state. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 22:14:47 GMT N3VKPB5QBJMXXC3QJL2HQFB4H4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korean-delegation-meets-mongolian-president-rare-visit-kcna-2024-03-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
At least one killed, 'several injured' after Israeli strikes on eastern Lebanon, sources sayAt least one civilian has been killed and several others injured after Israel launched four strikes on eastern Lebanon's city of Baalbek on Monday, two security sources and the Baalbek governor, Bashir Khader, told Reuters. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 22:13:19 GMT VTTBOIYM6JM4LLC7W4OXMA452A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/least-one-killed-several-injured-after-israeli-strikes-eastern-lebanon-sources-2024-03-11/Reuters世界中东
Israel urges UN Security Council to pressure Hamas on hostagesIsrael's Foreign Minister Israel Katz on Monday demanded the United Nations Security Council "put as much pressure as possible" on Palestinian militants Hamas to release the people it took hostage during the Oct. 7 attack on Israel. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 22:04:41 GMT YU52OGHYSVMGDIBUYYOX2GG5PY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-urges-un-security-council-Pressure-hamas-hostages-2024-03-11/Michelle Nichols世界中东
US-British forces strike Houthi targets, killing 11, Yemen government saysAirstrikes attributed to a U.S.-British coalition hit port cities and small towns in western Yemen on Monday, killing at least 11 people and injuring 14 while defending commercial shipping, a spokesperson for Yemen's internationally recognized government told Reuters. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 20:24:29 GMT 2BBGI44VSVOPRIYXUMT​​BTJBW7A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-british-forces-strike-houthi-targets-yemen-houthi-outlet-says-2024-03-11/Mohammed Ghobari世界中东
Ishaq Dar, Pakistan's former finance chief, takes up role as foreign ministerPakistan's former finance minister Ishaq Dar was named on Monday as the country's foreign minister, at a time when growing economic and security challenges will dominate the nation's foreign policy. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 18:46:10 GMT VIHDXW2M6NMBHFIMLHDSJRT6M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistans-former-finance-chief-takes-up-role-foreign-minister-2024-03-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Russian lawmakers seek to nullify Soviet transfer of Crimea to UkraineRussian lawmakers have submitted a draft bill to the State Duma that would rewrite a chapter of history by nullifying the Soviet decision in 1954 to transfer Crimea from Russia to Ukraine. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 17:47:06 GMT JIX3LCIKN5NTRCQMDCEJDWJXNY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-lawmakers-seek-nullify-soviet-transfer-crimea-ukraine-2024-03-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Russia responsible for Navalny's death, UN rights expert saysThe U.N. human rights expert on Russia said on Monday that the death of opposition politician Alexei Navalny was Moscow's responsibility as he was either killed in prison or died from detention conditions that amounted to torture. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 15:29:10 GMT N74MNNUWMZPHVBHXLNNOLJSWEU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-responsible-navalnys-death-un-rights-expert-says-2024-03-11/Emma Farge世界欧洲
Nigerian army hunts for kidnapped students, parents seek answersNigerian soldiers were on Monday hunting for armed kidnappers who seized nearly 300 school pupils in Kaduna state last week, a security source said, as distraught parents sought answers on when they would be reunited with their children. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 13:45:56 GMT SLACFGQFTVJRZPSAQNXKJE4BAU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/nigerian-army-hunts-kidnapped-students-parents-seek-answers-2024-03-11/Garba Muhammad, Hamza Ibrahim世界非洲
India implements citizenship law opposed by Muslims before electionIndia moved on Monday to implement a 2019 citizenship law that has been criticised as discriminating against Muslims, weeks before Prime Minister Narendra Modi seeks a rare third term for his Hindu nationalist government. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 12:47:02 GMT YHIS4DXEYNONVB7NPKY5SRY4XE https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-moves-implement-citizenship-law-opposed-by-muslims-weeks-before-election-2024-03-11/Rajesh Prabhuswamy世界印度
